Package com.elite.game.state

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    CreateGameKeyState
    State for inputting the Game Key
    CreateGameUsernameState
    State for inputting the players desired username
    GameOverState
    State to represent the game being over.
    LoadState
    Simple state that comes before all others and just loads the game assets and makes a connection to the server before passing on to a new MenuState
    LobbyState
    State to represent the game before the players have all joined and before the host has started the game.
    MenuState
    Menu state for the main menu of the game with the following buttons: Create Game Join Game Rules Quit
    PlayState
    Class that represents the state of the game when it is being played and the game is on going.
    QuitState
    Quit State
    RulesState
    Rules State to display the game rules/premise
    State
    Abstract class to represent a state of the game
